title: 3.2 Master Challenge 1
question:
Create a program called Myself. Add the answers for the following items to a list.

◼ Name
◼ Age
◼ Favorite subject
◼ Favorite food

Make a sprite say the things mentioned above about you in the program by calling items in the list.
__language_type_hint: python - sql - htmlcss - scratch - javascript - R - pseudocode - java

testcases.value:
Case = Test integer sum
input = 1 2 3 5
output = 11

Case = Test integer sum
input = 1
 -2
 3
 5
output = 7
